TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CombinedGeometry extends System.Windows.Media.Geometry
Public NotInheritable Class CombinedGeometry Inherits Geometry
public ref class CombinedGeometry sealed : System::Windows::Media::Geometry

summary.span: Represents a 2-D geometric shape defined by the combination of two objects.

span.span: Represents a 2-D geometric shape defined by the combination of two objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定组合两个几何图形的方式。The property specifies how the two geometries will be combined. 请注意，将合并指定两个几何图形，因此没有区域的几何图形的区域 (如) 结合使用时消失。Note that combines the area specified by two geometries, so geometries that do not have area (such as ) disappear when combined. 可以通过多种方式组合几何图形： 使用、 ，或方法类。Geometries can be combined in several ways: using a , a , or the method of the class. - A从一个或多个创建的复合几何图形对象。A creates a composite geometry from one or more objects. - A使用指定的布尔操作以组合两个所描述的区域对象。A uses a specified boolean operation to combine the area described by two objects. - 静态方法类，其行为与相同的方式在对象。The static method of the class behaves in exactly the same manner as the object. 使用时，应涉及认真考虑执行联合，因为它会占用大量的 CPU。Careful thought should be involved when using a to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive. 在大多数情况下，或将更好地工作。In most cases, a or will work better. 使用仅当时任何适用以下原则：Use a only when any of the following apply: - 几何操作不是联合。The geometric operation is not a union. - 有两种： 几何图形值自交，几何图形并且 (即实际很重要)。Either of the geometries have a value of and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the actually matters). - 时间并不是问题，但空间 （例如，如果该几何图形是创建一次，然后缓存）。Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached). 通常情况下，生成的输出小于。Typically, produces smaller output than . - 将描边所生成的几何图形，或将其用于路径动画和不提供所需的轮廓。The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and does not provide the desired outline. ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features A是一种对象。A is a type of object. 璝惠功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For information about features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
